mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id , a.login_id , a.phone , a.email , a.file_id , b.file_name , b.file_route , a.name , a.birth , a.gender FROM user a LEFT JOIN pic_file b ON (a.file_id = b.file_id) WHERE a.user_id = #{ userId }

SELECT i.influencer_id , i.user_id , COALESCE(y.name, ig.name, i.name) AS name , COALESCE(y.image_url, NULL) AS image_url FROM influencer i LEFT JOIN youtube y ON i.influencer_id = y.influencer_id LEFT JOIN instagram ig ON i.influencer_id = ig.influencer_id WHERE i.is_deleted = 'N' AND i.user_id = #{ userId }
